page.title: 15The Eling Parish Priest
page.content: Four children went to see the Vicar of Eling. They asked him lots of questions. They found out that he didn't like sports much, he spent a lot of time studying and reading. He has about 20 funerals a month. He gets up at about 7 on Sunday morning and after the service he goes home for a cup of tea. {St. Mary's Church}: We were told that when the water pipes were fitted they found a Roman coin. This may mean that there was a building there in Roman times. There has been a church on the spot for 2000 years. We saw the Altar and a picture of the Last Supper which was about 300 years old. There was a stained glass window made by William Morris.
